abstract: Makers of Wi-Fi routers boast of 5 times the speed and 15 times the range, but be sure to read the footnotes.
snippet: Makers of Wi-Fi routers boast of 5 times the speed and 15 times the range, but be sure to read the footnotes.
lead_paragraph: “When I was your age,” we’ll someday tell our awe-struck grandchildren, “wireless Internet was available only in isolated hot spots 100 feet across!”

headline.main: A Faster Wi-Fi World Is Coming
headline.print_headline: A Better Wi-Fi Not Quite Up To Its Promises

abstract: Citigroup‘s global cost-cutting effort will be felt especially keenly in New York, where Citi is the largest private employer. Of the 17,000 jobs the bank said would be cut, about 1,600 will be eliminated in the city, where Citigroup has 27,000 employees and its headquarters.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s global cost-cutting effort will be felt especially keenly in New York, where Citi is the largest private employer. Of the 17,000 jobs the bank said would be cut, about 1,600 will be eliminated in the city, where Citigroup has 27,000 employees and its headquarters.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Cuts Take a Bite Out of Big Apple
